ygData.subject: Re: Port EQ to LINUX
ygData.msgSnippet: Checked the site, doesn t look promising for EQ ers, however I may be so inclined as to make an attempt, even if it is a futile one.... Dag ... Verant to ...
ygData.messageBody:
Checked the site, doesn't look promising for EQ'ers, however I may be
so inclined as to make an attempt, even if it is a futile one....

Dag

--- In EverQuest@y..., Spuds McCat <spuds@l...> wrote:
> There are rumors that Loki Entertainment Software
> http://www.lokigames.com (Same people that have ported so
> many other games to Linux) is working on a port of EQ
>
> On Wed, 29 Aug 2001 dagdason@h... wrote:
>
> > Hey my EQ friends, just a thought. How nice could it be for
Verant to
> > port EQ to LINUX so that we who wish not to have our computers
> > invaded by Big Brother (Microsoft) can play with a calm mind.
Secure
> > in the knowledge that our personal freedoms are not being ripped
from
> > us by the corporate elite.
> >
> > Just my thought for the day
> >
> > Dagdason
